A well-lit dining area with ample space, complemented by natural light through strategically placed windows. The design promotes a harmonious dining experience.
A spacious master bedroom incorporating eco-friendly materials and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light, designed with Vastu in mind. It includes a private balcony facing the east.
A comfortable secondary bedroom optimized for privacy and relaxation, featuring energy-efficient fixtures and proper ventilation following local norms.
Another bedroom designed with sustainable materials ensuring a calm environment. Vastu guidelines influence the positioning to promote good energy flow.
A modern bathroom fitted with water-saving fixtures and natural lighting, strategically placed for privacy while considering Vastu principles.
